summary: This document is a summary of account balances and transactions for Darren K. Indyke's attorney trust account at Deutsche Bank from April 28 to April 30, 2015. It details the beginning and ending balances, as well as transaction details including deposits and withdrawals.

persons.name: Darren K. Indyke
persons.context: Darren K. Indyke is identified as the account holder of the attorney trust account at Deutsche Bank.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is mentioned as a contact for personal assistance regarding the account.

keyFacts: The document details the account balance for Darren K. Indyke's attorney trust account at Deutsche Bank.
The beginning balance on April 28, 2015, was $50.00, with no transactions resulting in a change to the balance.
Amanda Kirby is listed as a contact for inquiries related to the account.
The document outlines procedures for reporting errors in account statements.
The account had no overdraft fees or NSF return item fees during the statement period.
